inputs.name: Select Test
inputs.help_text: Select the required test to run diagnostics.

actions.enabled_when: A test is selected from the dropdown

constraints: Tests are dependent on the selected diagnostic type.
Ensure the Profiler is properly configured before running diagnostics.

errors.trigger: Occurs when password decryption fails during diagnostics.
Occurs when WMI connection fails during diagnostics.
Occurs when WMI query fails during diagnostics.
Occurs when SSH connection fails during diagnostics.
Occurs when SSH command execution fails during diagnostics.
Occurs when there is an issue with the SMTP configuration.

state_transitions.trigger: User clicks 'Run diagnostics' after selecting a test.
User resolves the issue and retries.

workflows.name: Run Diagnostics
steps: Navigate to Profiler -> Profiler Configuration -> Troubleshooting.
Select the required test from the dropdown.
Click 'Run diagnostics' to execute the test.
Review the results displayed after the test completes.
prerequisites: Ensure the Profiler is properly configured.
Ensure network connectivity for tests requiring external communication.
